I met with the President of the Republic of Mauritania regarding the extradition of the criminal Abdellah Snoussi to Libya. The meeting was good and agreed to Libya's request and extradition.
A group of the accompanying delegation visited Abdullah al-Sanusi in prison and were deprived of his personality. The criminal is in a safe prison in Mauritania and soon in Libby prison.
The arrest of the butcher Abdullah al-Sunoussi is another victory for the revolution of February 17 and its righteous martyrs. Praise be to Allaah.

International conventions do not allow the publication of photographs of detainees and we respect these charters. We did not take any pictures of Senoussi and the Mauritanian authorities do not allow this.
I have met the President of Mauritania and he agreed to the extension of Senussi to Libya.

We are already in Hanoi, Vietnam, a country with more than 90 million inhabitants and with which, recently, we signed a Free Trade Agreement.
We want to strengthen ties with the countries of the Asia-Pacific that will mean more opportunities for Chile, better jobs and wages.
I wish a Happy Mother's Day to my mother, my wife the virtuous mother and to all mothers. May they all have good health and happiness -MS

Now, Holden will make its next generation of cars in Australia & will keep making cars in Australia until at least 2022. JG

The Aysén Plan and solutions for health, education, as well as subsidies for the transport of fuel and firewood are already underway.
But not all requests, however legitimate, can be met immediately. The Government works for all Chileans.

Follow live on my campaign site http://t.co/EaXM2v7g from 19h our big gathering at #Aurillac! # FH2012
Tonight is not an evening like the others. #Aurillac
This public meeting is the first that I hold after the tragedy of Toulouse and Montauban. #Aurillac
At this moment my thoughts are with each of those broken lives, with families, and with those who are still fighting against death. #Aurillac
The terrorist wanted in this electoral period to divide us, and to terrify our national community. He will have failed. #Aurillac
There is a time for everything: a time to fight and a time to gather. #Aurillac
The campaign regains its rights but nothing should be forgotten. This tragedy will permanently mark the spirits. #Aurillac
The fight against terrorism is not over. It continues and will continue. #Aurillac
It is in the name of the values ​​of the Republic, for its values ​​and its values ​​that we will overcome the terrorist threat. #Aurillac
It is more Republic that will allow us to overcome and to be up to the challenges that we will face. #Aurillac
We will learn all the lessons from this tragedy. All conclusions will be put to good use by the Republic. #Aurillac
The Republic will not leave any terrorist in peace, and the Republic will defeat them. France will never let down the guard. #Aurillac
I will implement proximity security, provided by police in our neighborhoods. #Aurillac
I can not admit that 12,000 police and gendarme positions have been eliminated in the past five years. #Aurillac
The means of justice will be strengthened because we need faster justice. #Aurillac
The Republic is security, but it is also secularism. #Aurillac
I never complain when at the top of the state, secularism is finally proclaimed. But I want secularism without an epithet! #Aurillac
Secularism is our History but it is also our future. That's why I will put it in our constitution. #Aurillac
Today we must give the Republican machine all its energy. #Aurillac
We must face the facts: no one in France should be disrespectful. #Aurillac
Nobody must have to answer for its origin, its religion, its color of skin: each one must be citizen of the Republic. #Aurillac
On the right, they know how to do lessons, but they never learn them! #Aurillac
We will restore the initial training of teachers. #Aurillac
We need to train teachers to transmit the values ​​of the Republic. #Aurillac
It's a nice idea, civic service. It is a shame to have let him reduced to a few things. #Aurillac
I am committed to increasing the number of young people per generation by 100,000 who will be in civic service. #Aurillac
Patriotism must be claimed! #Aurillac
No young person in France must think that he is not French if he has citizenship. #Aurillac
"French" is the most beautiful word that can be associated with the word "citizen". #Aurillac
What will resume today is the confrontation, the debate. But what has just happened requires us to live up to the challenge.
For the last three days, all my actions, all my words, my actions have been guided by the desire to bring the national community together. #Aurillac
For me, authority presupposes appeasement, firmness calls harmony and responsibility requires unity. #Aurillac
The gathering is a constancy and not a circumstance. #Aurillac
Nothing will stop the change coming! #Aurillac
Consciousness, trust and coherence: these are the three words to which I attach my campaign. #Aurillac
We will open a new path for the youth of France! #Aurillac.
It is by reviving the French dream that we will make France love all its children. #Aurillac
I want to make France love because I want the Republic to be bigger! #Aurillac
